description: This file declares external function prototypes related to network interface objects in the ANSC (Advanced Networking Service Container) framework. It includes creation functions for network interfaces and IPv4-specific interfaces, and contains licensing and module information.

methods.name: AnscCreateNetworkInterface
methods.description: Creates a new Network Interface object within the ANSC framework.

methods.name: AnscCreateNioIp4
methods.description: Creates a new IPv4 Network Interface object within the ANSC framework.
